name: Edwin
text:
Why stop at one VanCardBack?

Acquired by purchasing the Hero Edwin VanCleef.

name: Vanndar
text:
The battle for Alterac could just be an excuse for the Horde and Alliance to play in the snow together.

Acquired by pre-purchasing Fractured in Alterac.

name: Carved Autumn
text:
Hewn from a single slab of imported Westfall Oak, this decorative piece is a masterclass in dwarven woodcarving.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, November 2021.

name: Scarf of the Hearth
text:
It brings a cozy feeling that you know all too well.

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, December 2021.
